text: Pleurothyrium is a genus of flowering plants in the family Lauraceae. Many of the species were first described in a 1993 revision of the genus.van der Werff, H. (1993). A revision of the genus Pleurothyrium (Lauraceae). Annals of the Missouri Botanical Garden, 39-118. Species include:Pleurothyrium. The Plant List. *Pleurothyrium amapaense *Pleurothyrium amplifolium *Pleurothyrium bifidum *Pleurothyrium cinereum *Pleurothyrium costanense *Pleurothyrium cuneifolium * Pleurothyrium giganthum van der Werff *Pleurothyrium glabrifolium *Pleurothyrium glabritepalum *Pleurothyrium golfodulcense *Pleurothyrium guindonii * Pleurothyrium hexaglandulosum van der Werff *Pleurothyrium immersum *Pleurothyrium insigne *Pleurothyrium intermedium *Pleurothyrium maximum *Pleurothyrium nobile *Pleurothyrium oblongum * Pleurothyrium obovatum van der Werff *Pleurothyrium palmanum *Pleurothyrium panurense *Pleurothyrium parviflorum *Pleurothyrium pauciflorum *Pleurothyrium pilosum *Pleurothyrium poeppigii *Pleurothyrium racemosum * Pleurothyrium roberto-andinoi C. Nelson *Pleurothyrium steyermarkianum *Pleurothyrium synandrum *Pleurothyrium tomentellum *Pleurothyrium tomiwahlii *Pleurothyrium trianae *Pleurothyrium undulatum *Pleurothyrium vasquezii *Pleurothyrium westphalii *Pleurothyrium williamsii ==References== Category:Lauraceae Category:Laurales genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
